Package ie.gmit.sw.parser

Class Parser<T>

java.lang.Object
ie.gmit.sw.parser.Parser<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of the object that is to be parsed
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Void>
Direct Known Subclasses:
QueryParser, SubjectParser
public abstract class Parser<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Void>
This class serves as the root class of all parser classes. The class contains a generic "parsable" type as well as an integer array listing all the k-mer sizes that will be parsed. For instance, k[1,2,3] means each 1-gram, 2-gram and 3-gram of the text will be parsed. This array cannot be empty. This class implements the Callable interface and all subclasses are required to provide a call() method.
See Also:
QueryParser, SubjectParser
